content: quote: Originally posted by dragonflyer04: DNA is a good reasearch tool these days...dig them old President's up and DNA their azzes..that will put an end to the conjecture. Well, most folk checking off "white" on census forms have some sub-Saharan African ancestry. The best remedy is the cheapest- quit speculating over the highly unlikely and ultimately unimportant, and learn to treat each other decently today.
